name: Dissimortuum
description: A medium-sized undead creature with a strong presence and a horrifying mask that induces fear.
memorable: It can instill fear with its Terrifying Mask ability, affecting multiple foes at once.
goals: To intimidate and control opponents while engaging in combat.
relations: May serve as servants or guardians to more powerful undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, eerie, or abandoned locations.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage; can climb difficult surfaces easily.
weaknesses: Has average Dexterity and low Intelligence, making it predictable in tactics.
attacks: Uses Multiattack to perform three claw attacks, inflicting significant slashing damage with each.
most_powerful_ability: Terrifying Mask can frighten opponents within a 60-foot radius, creating fear-based control in battles.
senses: Has darkvision allowing it to see in dim light.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Strong saving throw proficiency in Constitution, enhancing resilience.
Is immune to conditions like charmed and exhausted, making it difficult to control.
Capable of traversing walls and ceilings with Spider Climb.
